about.title: About Jishnu
description: I'm a Senior DevOps / Site Reliability Engineer with 8+ years of experience designing and operating production-scale Kubernetes and cloud platforms.

I focus on reliability, automation, and observability, owning systems end-to-end from infrastructure design and CI/CD to monitoring and incident response. I've worked extensively with AWS, Kubernetes, and infrastructure as code, building stable, predictable systems that scale with teams and traffic.

experience.title: Experience Journey
experience.description: A progression from Linux systems engineering to DevOps and Site Reliability Engineering, with increasing ownership of scale, automation, and production reliability.

jobs.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
description: Led SRE initiatives across 100+ Kubernetes clusters, improving reliability and consistency of multi-cluster production workloads.
Built Python-based automation to validate services and reduce manual testing across teams.
Designed and operated Prometheus/Grafana observability and alerting, improving incident detection and reducing MTTR.
Standardized pipeline-as-code using Jenkins and Drone CI to enable repeatable, compliant deployments.

jobs.title: Cloud Support Engineer | EC2 Linux SME
description: Acted as Tier-3 AWS & Linux escalation engineer, resolving complex EC2, OS, and networking failures for enterprise customers.
Built Python-based automation tools using AWS services, reducing manual intervention by ~40%.
Troubleshot critical boot, performance, and networking issues under high-severity operational scenarios.
Led customer launches, authored RCAs, and supported large-scale production events under AWS Premium Support.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
description: Managed Linux infrastructure across AWS, GCP, and DigitalOcean, supporting production workloads.
Introduced Docker-based containerization, reducing deployment time by ~40%.
Implemented blue-green Kubernetes deployments, enabling zero-downtime releases.
Automated CI/CD and infrastructure provisioning, significantly reducing manual effort and deployment errors.

jobs.title: Linux System Administrator
description: Built strong Linux and automation foundations, managing networking services and production servers.
Automated package creation and deployments, achieving 99.9% successful release rates.
Developed Shell and Python automation to reduce manual operations and improve efficiency.
Introduced CI/CD pipelines and monitoring, reducing downtime and improving system visibility.
